Text: FW Rainbow Gas penalty calculation Cc Theresa Paul Lucci wanted me to send you an update Rainbow Gas Chris Faul has requested refund for their prepayment but they still owe for the penalty charges and actuals I received from Chris Faul this will leave a balance of Do you want me to deduct the balance from the refund or do you want to call John Childers to go over the balances Last time I spoke with him he was not going to pay the penalty charage plus we do not agree on the volumes actuals I will wait until I hear from you You can reach me at Thanks Linda Ewing Original Message From Boxx Pam B Sent Thursday June PM To Staab Theresa Cc Ewing Linda J Subject RE Rainbow Gas penalty calculation Attached is the spreadsheet showing the calculation for the penalty charge Please let me know if you have any questions concerning it After you have entered the charge please let myself and Linda Ewing know so Linda can invoice the penalty to the customer Thanks Pam Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Friday June PM To Boxx Pam B Subject Rainbow Gas Invoice Revised File Rainbow Gas May xls Theresa
